title: Killer Bait (1955) Lizabeth Scott, Don De Fore, Dan Duryea - Noir Full Movie

sources.title: Killer Bait (1955) Lizabeth Scott, Don De Fore, Dan Duryea - Noir Full Movie
sources.description: Killer Bait is a film noir crime film released in 1955, directed by Byron Haskin and starring Lizabeth Scott, Don DeFore, Dan Duryeaand Arthur Kennedy. The screenplay was written by Roy Huggins, developed from a serial he wrote for the Saturday Evening Post. The film originally came out in 1949 as Too Late For Tears and then was reissued as Killer Bait in 1955.
